spell_tooltip.description: Increases Item Level by 5 and increases the potency of all Azerite powers granted by this item.
Increases your movement speed by 28% of your highest secondary rating, up to 8%.
Your damaging abilities have a chance to grant 60 critical strike rating for 5 sec. This effect stacks up to 5 times.
Your secondary stats are all increased by 54.
While Trueshot is active you gain 124 Critical Strike rating every sec, stacking up to 10 times.

name: Heart of Azeroth

main_spell_tooltip.description:
Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate Trueshot for 35% of its base duration.

When the Vision of Perfection activates, you and up to 2 other nearby allies gain 4 Haste for 10 sec.

passive_spell_tooltip.description:
Reduces the cooldown of Trueshot by 10.0%, and increases your Versatility by 3.

When you activate Trueshot, immediately heal for 5% of maximum health.
Your spells and abilities have a chance to refund 50% of the Focus spent on them, heal you for 116, and increase your Versatility by 13 for 8 sec.

Your movement speed is increased by 5%, and when you move more than 25 yds within 4 sec, gain 8 Agility for 20 sec.

This can only occur once every 30 sec.

Your spells and abilities have a chance to strike your target for 115 Fire damage, and heal you for 50% of the damage dealt.

If your target is below 20% health, the chance for extra damage is increased by 400%.

Unique:  Corruption Resistance increased by 10.

spells.description: Equip: Harnesses the energy of raw Azerite, awakening exceptional pieces of armor that possess latent powers.

description: A living symbol of hope, borne by the champions of a dying planet. The fate of Azeroth will be shared by all her children.

spell_tooltip.description: Increases Item Level by 5 and increases the potency of all Azerite powers granted by this item.
Increases your movement speed by 28% of your highest secondary rating, up to 8%.
Your damaging abilities have a chance to grant you Elemental Whirl, increasing your Critical Strike, Haste, Mastery, or Versatility by 220 for 10 sec.
Every 150,000 damage and healing done you gain Omnipotence, increasing your highest stat by 480 for 15 sec. You heal for 5% of all Arcane damage taken.
While Trueshot is active you gain 120 Critical Strike rating every sec, stacking up to 10 times.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Mantle of the Golden Forest

spells.description: Equip: Proclaim your fashion sense to the world.

spell_tooltip.description: Increases Item Level by 5 and increases the potency of all Azerite powers granted by this item.
Increases your movement speed by 28% of your highest secondary rating, up to 8%.
Your damaging abilities have a chance to grant you Elemental Whirl, increasing your Critical Strike, Haste, Mastery, or Versatility by 238 for 10 sec.
Your secondary stats are all increased by 56.
While Trueshot is active you gain 129 Critical Strike rating every sec, stacking up to 10 times.

effects.display_string: (2) Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that increases your auto shot damage by 200% and reduces the time between auto shots by 0.5 sec for 10 sec. Casting Trueshot always hits a Jackpot!
(4) Set: Consuming Lock and Load also fires an Explosive Shot at 300% effectiveness.

name: Turbo-Drain 5000

spells.description: Equip: Your harmful spells and abilities have a chance to drain your target's electrical power, dealing 240,291 Nature damage over 5 sec. If the target dies while being drained, you gain 25% movement speed for 5 sec.

description: The 8th Rule of Commerce: Fast goblins are smart goblins!

name: Mechano-Core Amplifier

spells.description: Equip: Your harmful abilities have a chance to power the amplifier, randomly increasing either your highest secondary stat by 2,599 or your lowest secondary stat by 3,279 for 10 sec.

description: Intended for machine use only. Use at your own risk.
